entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor: Query Parameter (ReturnUrl) not received when using InteractiveServer mode after authorization redirection #60836
  • Reload doesn't work when resources are updated #60835
  • Perf regression: fortunes, single_query #60834
  • Perf improvement: caching, json_middleware, single_query #60833
  • Refactoring DiagnosticDescriptors.cs files #60831
  • Perf improvement: json, json_middleware #60828

Closed

  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, json #60812
  • Perf regression: fortunes, json, single_query #60827

PullRequests

Created

  • Refactoring DiagnosticDescriptors.cs files #60832
    area-mvc, community-contribution

Updated

  • [Blazor] Flow the WebAssembly options from Server to client through SSR marker #60714
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, 10.0-preview3
  • Support input validation for minimal APIs via generic resolver model #60724
    area-minimal

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ITMS-91061: Missing privacy manifest #28262
  • ObjCRuntime.RuntimeException Failed to marshal the Objective-C object 0x1367c9900 (type: Microsoft_Maui_Platform_MauiTextField) #28261
  • [Bug] iOS: On-Demand Resource Tag not available to be set #28260

PullRequests

Created

  • Fixed the Label text is cropped inside the border control with a specific padding value on certain Android devices #28259
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • fix-27998 - [Windows] ScrollView is not scrolling to the bottom if in grid with *,auto Width #28258
    community ✨
  • Fix: OnIdiom Default Value Handling for ValueType Properties #28257
    community ✨
  • [Android] DatePicker not respecting UserAppTheme - fix #28256
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker

Updated

  • Picker Attribute "SelectedIndex" Not being respected on page load - fix #22353
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • Fix Incorrect Scrolling Behavior in CollectionView ScrollTo Method Using Index Value #27246
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Added a support for GradientBrushes on Shape.Stroke #22208
    t/enhancement ☀️, platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, community ✨
  • [Android] Flyout Page - support for a custom flyout icon #22099
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • [Android] Entry & Picker VerticalTextAlignment ignored #21966
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-entry, area-controls-picker
  • [iOS] BoxView auto scaling not working when layout changes #21955
    area-layout, area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #28203
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-09

Issues

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Clearer additional method overloads for narrowing/widening a vector #113307
  • Add support for custom versions of libfuzzer-dotnet in fuzzing #113303
  • Invalid .NET 10 MissingMethodException with specific SDK versions #113302

Closed

  • Duplicate UDP socket bind not generating an error #36618
  • [API Proposal]: Let MemoryPool<T>.Shared.Rent support clear the data when return #96396
  • RSACng Decryption throwing Internal Error Occurred exception #97027
  • [API Proposal]: Add Missing methods to SubjectAlternativeNameBuilder Ex: AddDirectoryName #112069
  • [browser][io] Emscripten does not support file locking. #40065
  • ExpressionStringBuilder improvement request #113270

PullRequests

Created

  • Force write of local file header when "version needed to extract" changes #113306
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [10.0/preview2] JIT: make array stack disable work in release builds #113305
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove AreVNsEquivalent #113304
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Add some more constant folding in lowering #113301
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Apply hardware intrinsics to `BitArray.*Shift` #113299
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 134.0.6998.35, windows: 134.0.6998.36 #113297
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • Update `.comment` section #113255
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • [mono] vector intrinsics fixes #113288
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Replace `Unsafe.As` with `Unsafe.Read{Write}Unaligned` #113293
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Expand capability of CoreCLR Interpreter #113292
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • JIT: Accelerate Vector.Dot for all base types #111853
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Unblock Vector###<long> intrinsics on x86 #112728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: enable inlining methods with EH #112998
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • OSDescription: Returns a user-friendly name instead of kernel info on Android & Apple platforms #113041
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, os-mac-os-x, os-android, os-ios, os-maccatalyst, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Optimize loading 64 bit constant with new algorithm implementation and using `emitDataConst` #113250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Introduce `LclVarDsc::lvIsMultiRegDest` #113294
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable `UseSizeOptimizedLinq` by default on native AOT #113214
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Refactor `CertFreeCRLContext` #112207
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/8.0.3xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #47401
  • Encoded plus sign in image mediaType for container publish #47399
  • dotnet watch crashes with "An unexpected error ocurred" #47392

Closed

  • .NET 9 SDK introduces hang in `dotnet format` when run on Azure Pipelines in combination with NB.GV #44951
  • 9.0.103 breaks "dotnet restore" in WSL #47396

PullRequests

Created

  • dotnet package list should not throw if project not specified #47402
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implicit restore dotnet list package #47400
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • enforce OCI format for inner images when publishing tarballs or to local docker instances #47398
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Generate the sdk msi bundles inside the VMR on windows BuildPass=2 verticals #47397
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • dotnet test improvements for MTP #47395
    Area-dotnet test, untriaged
  • Delete GetTestsProject task #47394
    untriaged

Merged

  • NuGetPackageDownloader: Only verify signing on windows by default #47321
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2658528 #47010
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #47367
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #47366
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Move BuildWithNetFrameworkHostedCompiler to common #47067
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fixup sourcelink information #47363
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Attempt to Fix and Re-enable HasIncludedFiles Test #47220
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use right hand side references even when not compatible #47065
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • [9.0.3xx] Add analyzer redirecting VSIX #47021
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
